definition.text: The Garman Klass/Yang Zhang (GK YZ) Channels features a GKYZ filtered, non linear regression moving average as well as an upper and lower channel with entry and exit signals.

paragraphs.text: GK YZ Channels on the Charts

The indicator uses a non-linear regression analysis to predict the average of the price based on previous data samples. It then applies a GK-YZ historial volatility filter to help reduce noise in the price action.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| GKYZChannels | GKYZ | value, upper, lower, signal |
The `signal` value indicates a potential "go long" or "go short" entry.
The parameters of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "GK YZ Channels" Procedure Loop.
A simple entry point for a trade could be when the signal value has a value of 1:
